online community members: this community as a whole should understand that listening to indigenous voices is imperative and should be working to hold their community member accountable both online and offline
i would like to see this community educating themselves more and uplifting Indigenous peoples rather than invalidating our experiences
the public: racism and anti-indigenous sentiments exist both in person and online. It's important to hold ourselves and online community members accountable to prevent people from marginalized communities from being harmed on social media platforms like twitter
friends and family: although its not the responsibility of friends and family to repair the harms, I think we should understand that friend and family presence are needed during these instances to help express tour feelingss and offer support to one another.
